title.narrative: Water supply and environmental sanitation for the displaced Al Hudaydah Governorate (Phase IV).

description.narrative: - (4,900) beneficiaries received (7.5) liters of drinking water daily. - (4,900) beneficiaries received (7.5) liters of water suitable for daily use. - Limiting the spread of diseases and epidemics to (4,900) displaced persons in a camp. - Securing the needs of water needs and preserving the lives of (4,900) displaced people.

1- Preserving the lives of the displaced by continuing to secure safe and healthy sources of water in the IDP gathering areas in Al Hudaydah Governorate and its directorates 2- Drainage of waste and waste in a safe and healthy manner 3- Preventive maintenance of water tanks, sewage, and toilets.

Save life and maintain its continuity, limit the spread of diseases and epidemics, and secure a safe and healthy environment for the displaced by providing basic services in the water and environmental sanitation sector.
